query: UPDATE island_guides SET topThingsToDo = '[{"title":"Visit Friday Mosque","description":"Explore the iconic Friday Mosque, one of the most important religious sites in Male"},{"title":"Explore Male City Centre","description":"Walk through the vibrant streets of Male city center with colorful buildings and local shops"},{"title":"Shop at Local Markets","description":"Browse local crafts and souvenirs at the bustling Male markets"},{"title":"Relax at Artificial Beach","description":"Enjoy swimming and relaxation at the artificial beach on the eastern side of Male"},{"title":"Visit National Centre","description":"Learn about Maldivian culture and history at the National Centre"},{"title":"Try Local Cuisine","description":"Taste authentic Maldivian dishes at local restaurants and street food stalls"}]' WHERE slug = 'male-capital-city';
